channel.title: Dave Winer
channel.description: On the net since mid-70s. Started two Silicon Valley companies. Wrote for Wired. Fellow at Harvard, NYU. Founder of podcasting, blogging, RSS. Open web.

item.description: America’s politics appear to be stubbornly fixed. That's like saying someone with the flu has a high temperature. The actual problem is the US had a genetic defect at birth that makes it seemingly impossible for it to be united. Slavery.

source:outline.text: America’s politics appear to be stubbornly fixed. That's like saying someone with the flu has a high temperature. The actual problem is the US had a genetic defect at birth that makes it seemingly impossible for it to be united. Slavery.

item.description: “We have a lottery that says if you’re vaccinated we’re going to give you stuff. Well, you’ve got another lottery for them, and it’s a death lottery.”
